meanings.sent1: She resketched the drawing to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He resketched the map to correct the mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The artist resketched the portrait with a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: The architect resketched the building plans with a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent5: After the feedback, she resketched the design with more details.

meanings.definition: To make a new sketch of something previously sketched.
meanings.sent1: They resketched the logo for the company rebranding.
meanings.sent2: The student resketched the landscape for art class.
meanings.sent3: The child resketched the family portrait in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The designer resketched the dress pattern for the fashion show.
meanings.sent5: In preparation for the exhibition, he resketched the cityscape with vibrant colors.
